name: (S)Dressed to Impress
description:
You are an average chump and–without questioning your instincts–you find yourself trying to meet the interests of the office woman you’re interested in. You don’t really like sushi and reading, do you?

HTML5 game that suppots WASD, arrow keys, and an Xbox Controller.

Made in about 48 hours for Ludum Dare #48!

Credits 

PixelCrustPunk- art 

jtn191-design, coding, art, sfx, music (guitar, synths, mixing, trombone sfx)

*I know scores are sort of buggy...will try to revisit
